entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 7:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
